name: parchment booklet
description: It is an old booklet that feels the weight of history. How to deal with vampires and weaknesses are listed in detail. It is only a place that seems clearly to be creative, but it is quite interesting.

name: Demon's Cookbook
description: A memorandum summarizing how to use the demon's tools.

name: Nazrin
description: An introduction to dowsing that explains how to use a pendulum or rod. It also contains tips that may be useful for survival.

name: Kusanagi
description: I knew I wasn't recognized by the sword, but it is this result if I shook around to protect myself. It can not be repaired by my skill if it becomes a monster. No ... There are multiple Kusanagi swords ... If you borrow the spirit of another Kusanagi ...

name: Time Cooking
description: It is a highly creative cooking bowl that presupposes the exercise of the ability to manipulate time (If it is only a book, it is Ehime that it can be used other than Sakiyaitei)

name: Patchouli Grimoire
description: It is a very valuable book that contains ancient mysteries. Even in this world, it is possible to use magic slightly.

name: Alchemy Recipes
description: It is a very valuable book that contains ancient mysteries. It describes how to make various metals using the sage's stone as a medium.

name: Alice Grimoire
description: It is a very valuable book that contains ancient mysteries. There is a cute ribbon on the cover. Some magic seems to be usable in this world.

name: Remilia's Diary
description: It is a bloody diary. The days are spelled with sadness, and the diary is broken with the contents such as 'The madness distorted sister runs away.' and 'The residents of the house are made vampires.'
